title: Service disruption due to train fault on East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线列车故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan kerana kerosakan kereta api di Laluan Timur Barat
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் ரயில் கோளாறு காரணமாக சேவை தடங்கல்

updates.text: Trains service on the East bound is running normally now.
[EWL] UPDATE: Expect additional travelling time of 15 mins from  #Bugis towards #Aljunied. Trains and platforms are crowded.
[EWL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #Bugis to #Aljunied towards PasirRis due to train fault.
